mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, LIMITTIME, PRINCIPALOPER, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, CORPID, OPERNFLAG, PERCENTAGE, CLIPARTFLAG, SALESFLAG, CHECKFLAG, ESTIMATEDSTARTTIME, ESTIMATEDENDTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, STATUS, PROJECTNAME from db_projectbbs where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select SEQUENCEID, LIMITTIME, PRINCIPALOPER, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, CORPID, OPERNFLAG, PERCENTAGE, CLIPARTFLAG, SALESFLAG, CHECKFLAG, ESTIMATEDSTARTTIME, ESTIMATEDENDTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, STATUS, PROJECTNAME from db_projectbbs
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , LIMITTIME , PRINCIPALOPER , OPER , OPERTIME , CREATEOPER , CREATETIME , CORPID , OPERNFLAG , PERCENTAGE , CLIPARTFLAG , SALESFLAG , CHECKFLAG , ESTIMATEDSTARTTIME , ESTIMATEDENDTIME , STARTTIME , ENDTIME , STATUS , PROJECTNAME

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
LIMITTIME = #{limittime,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
PRINCIPALOPER = #{principaloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CREATEOPER = #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERNFLAG = #{opernflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PERCENTAGE = #{percentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CLIPARTFLAG = #{clipartflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SALESFLAG = #{salesflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CHECKFLAG = #{checkflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ESTIMATEDSTARTTIME = #{estimatedstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
ESTIMATEDENDTIME = #{estimatedendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
PROJECTNAME = #{projectname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1

LIMITTIME = #{limittime,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
PRINCIPALOPER = #{principaloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
